Workflow.WorkStageName:
The **Corporate Banking team** conducts marketing for deposits targeting corporate customers,

And the **Operations team** contacts the finance managers of those corporate customers to confirm their intention to open deposit accounts.
The **Operations team** informs the finance managers of corporate customers about the **documents required** to open a new deposit account and collects those documents.

Receive and review the application form for opening a new deposit account, ensuring all required information is correctly filled out.

Pay particular attention to details such as
1. Customer's name, address, contact information, deposit amount/term, and taxpayer identification number (Tax ID #).
2. Verify that the authorized signatory of the customer has signed the form by cross-referencing it with the signatory document provided during account opening.
3. After confirming, stamp the form with "Signature checked," and the verifying staff (OP Staff) should sign the document.

**New customer?**
(Is this the first time the customer is opening a deposit account at this branch?)

The function of this screen is to **create a new deposit account** by entering the required information and uploading necessary documents.

① Enter details such as **Account Group Kind**, **Account Group**, **Customer Number**, and **Open Date**.
② Upload the supporting documents needed for account opening.
**Process a deposit** after opening this account?

The function of this screen is to **send deposit confirmations**.

① **Select** key details such as **Account No.** or **Customer No.**, then click the **Inquiry** button to retrieve relevant data.
② From the displayed results, **select one or multiple entries**, and click the **UMS** button to initiate the process of sending the **Deposit Confirmation**.
Is this a **cash-in** deposit (Transaction Code = CASH IN)?
Confirm deposit detail via **Cash**

In this case the screen is used to **facilitate cash deposits into a specified account**.

① Select the **Transaction Code** as **"CASH IN"**.
② Enter the **Deposit Account Number**, **amount**, and other required details.
③ Press **Enter** to process the transaction.
④ Verify the printed **Voucher** to confirm the transaction details.

Is the money from **another account** ?
(Transaction Code = ACCOUNT FROM)
Confirm deposit details from **other account of the customer**

In this case the screen is used to **process deposit transactions** efficiently.

① Select the **Transaction Code** as **"ACCOUNT FROM"**.
② Input the **Deposit Account Number**, **amount**, and other required details.
③ Press **Enter** to complete the transaction.
④ Review the printed **Voucher** to confirm the transaction details.

Is this a **Check** deposit?
(Transaction Code = CHECK DEPOSIT)
Confirm deposit details using a **check**

In this case the screen is used to **process check deposits** by entering relevant check details and verifying the transaction.

① Select the **Transaction Code** as **"CHECK DEPOSIT"**.
② Input the check details, including **check information and amount**.
③ Press the **Enter** button to process the transaction.
④ Verify the transaction by reviewing the printed **voucher**.
The OP team staff verifies the deposit amount credited to the **Depo account** and then notifies the Treasury staff of the deposit details.

The Treasury staff issues **n deal slips** corresponding to the number (*n*) of deposit account openings.

The Operations (OP) staff then receives these deal slips and fills in the "At Maturity" section with the account to which the deposit maturity amount will be paid to the customer. In the "Remarks" section, they write "email," indicating that the customer has confirmed via email.

After approval by the supervisor, the OP team leader selects "Yes" in the "Check" section at the bottom right and signs the slip.

In this case, the screen is used to **process deposit transactions** by entering relevant account and transaction details.

① Select the **Transaction Code** as **"OTHER DEPOSIT"**.
② Input the **Deposit Account Number**, **amount**, and other necessary details.
③ Press **Enter** to confirm the transaction.
④ Verify the printed **Voucher** to ensure the details are accurate.
NewYork branch?

The function of this screen is to **generate and send deposit confirmations**.

① **Select** the desired **Account Group Kind** and **Account No.**, then click the **Inquiry** button to retrieve relevant records.
② From the displayed results, **select one or multiple entries** and click the **UMS** button to send deposit confirmations.
Receive a withdrawal application form from the customer.

Customer want to receive the withdrawal amount in **cash**?
(Transaction Code = CASH OUT)

In this case,
① Input the **Withdraw Account Number** and perform a search.

② Select the **Transaction Code** as “**CASH OUT**,” then input the transaction details and withdrawal amount.

③ Click the **Enter** button to process the withdrawal transaction.
④ Verify the printed **Voucher** to confirm the transaction.
Customer wish to **transfer** the withdrawn deposit to **another account**? (Transaction Code = ACCOUNT TRANSFER)

In this case,
① Input the **Withdraw Account Number** and perform a search.

② Select the **Transaction Code** as “**ACCOUNT TRANSFER**,” then input the transaction details and withdrawal amount.

③ Click the **Enter** button to process the withdrawal transaction.
④ Verify the printed **Voucher** to confirm the transaction.

In this case,
① Input the **Withdraw Account Number** and perform a search.

② Select the **Transaction Code** as “**OTHER WITHDRAW**,” then input the transaction details and withdrawal amount.

③ Click the **Enter** button to process the withdrawal transaction.
④ Verify the printed **Voucher** to confirm the transaction.
Is NewYork Branch?

(KR) Account No., Customer No. 등을 선택 후 조회 버튼을 클릭 (EN) Select Account No., Customer No., etc. and press Inquiry button (KR) 조회된 결과 그리드를 단건/복수 선택 후, 확인서 발송을 위한 UMS 버튼 클릭 (EN) Select an entry/entries of the results, and press UMS button to send Deposit Confirmation   [NK_BIZ_0386] 출금 Confirmation을 UMS를 통한 자동 발송
Receive a **"Closing the Account on Maturity"** application from the customer.

The function of this screen is to **close a customer's deposit account upon maturity**.

① Click the **Search** button to view term deposits reaching maturity.
② Select the account to be closed and confirm the pre-entered interest rate under the **Apply Interest Rate** section.
③ In the **Transaction Information** area, enter the deposit details based on the chosen transaction method and click **Enter** to complete the process.
Is NewYork Branch?

(KR) Account No. 선택 후 조회 버튼을 클릭 (EN) Select Account No. and press Inquiry button (KR) 조회된 결과 그리드를 단건/복수 선택 후, 확인서 발송을 위한 UMS 버튼 클릭 (EN) Select an entry/entries of the results, and press UMS button to send Deposit Confirmation
A customer inquired about the expected interest amount (**Early Close interest amount**) in the event of an **early termination** of a time deposit.
Is this a branch that manages **early termination interest rates** for each product?
(KR) 고객 번호 및 중도 해지 일자를 선택하고 조회 버튼을 클릭하여 출력된 계좌 목록을 확인 (EN) Select Customer No. and Calculation To Date, and click Inquiry button to show the list of accounts

(KR) 계좌 목록 그리드를 클릭하여 화면 하단에서 중도 해지 이자율, 이자 금액 등 중도 해지 관련 예상 정보를 확인 (EN) Click an entry of the account list and check Early Close information such as interest rate, interest amount at the bottom of the screen

(KR) 고객 번호 및 중도 해지 일자 선택, 중도 해지 이자율 기입 및 조회 버튼을 클릭하여 출력된 계좌 목록을 확인 (EN) Select Customer No. and Calculation To Date, fill in Early Close Interest Rate field and click Inquiry button to show the list of accounts

(KR) 계좌 목록 그리드를 클릭하여 화면 하단에서 중도 해지 이자율, 이자 금액 등 중도 해지 관련 예상 정보를 확인 (EN) Click an entry of the account list and check Early Close information such as interest rate, interest amount at the bottom of the screen
Provide the customer with information about the expected interest amount for early termination and receive **the early termination application** from the customer.

The function of this screen is to **process the early closure of time deposit accounts**.

① **Click the inquiry button** to display the list of time deposit accounts eligible for early closure.
② **Select an account** to close, then enter the **early closure interest rate** in the **Apply Interest Rate** field.
③ **Enter deposit transaction details** in the **Transaction Information** section according to the chosen deposit method.
④ **Press the Enter button** to complete the transaction.
Is NewYork Branch?
(KR) Account No. 선택 후 조회 버튼을 클릭 (EN) Select Account No. and press Inquiry button
(KR) 조회된 결과 그리드를 단건/복수 선택 후, 확인서 발송을 위한 UMS 버튼 클릭 (EN) Select an entry/entries of the results, and press UMS button to send Deposit Confirmation

③ Select the **Reference No.** from the transaction generated by process **[131400]**.
④ Click the **Enter** button.

Is there have been any **changes** to the **customer's information**?
(between the initial account opening and now)

(KO) 최초 예금가입 시점 ~ 예금 연장/증액 시점 사이 고객 정보 변경 사항에 대한 OFAC 및 KYC 실시  (EN) Conduct OFAC and KYC with regards to changes in customer information from the time of initial deposit account opening to the specific time of change

**Receive and review application forms** for adjusting the amount of a deposit.

① **Verify** that all required details, such as the customer's name, address, contact information, deposit amount/term, and **Taxpayer Identification Number (Tax ID #)**, are accurately completed.
② **Cross-check** the customer's signature with the authorized signatory document provided during account registration.
③ Once verified, **stamp the form** with "Signature checked" and have the verifying staff member (**OP Staff**) sign to confirm verification.
(KO) 만기 도래 기존 정기예금 계좌를 만기 해지 처리 (EN) Close the Time Deposit account on maturity
(KO) 증액 또는 감액된 신규 정기예금 계좌 개설 (EN) Open a new account for the increased or decreased amount of deposit
Notifying the owner of the account about the account closure through the **Unified Messaging System (UMS)**?

In this case, select one or multiple accounts subject to close,

**click the UMS button to send the notification**.

② Click the **Inquiry button** to display the results as a list.

Workflow.WorkStageName:
1. **Receiving** a **withdrawal request** from a customer who has expressed their intention to withdraw funds from a **"Notice Deposit Account."**

2. **Reviewing** the details of the **withdrawal request**, including the notice period and other relevant information, as well as verifying the **signature** (official seal).
**Partial withdrawal** from the "Notice Deposit"?

The function of this screen is to **adjust the maturity date** for a **Notice Deposit account**.

① Enter **Customer No.** and **Account No.** in the respective fields, then click the **Inquiry** button to retrieve account details.
② Input the desired **Maturity Date** in the corresponding field and press the **Enter** button to update the information.

1. **Receiving** a **withdrawal request** from a customer who has expressed their intention to withdraw funds from a **"Notice Deposit Account."**

2. **Reviewing** the details of the **withdrawal request**, including the notice period and other relevant information, as well as verifying the **signature** (official seal).

The function of this screen is to **facilitate partial withdrawals** from a selected account.

① Enter the **Withdraw Account Number** and click the **Inquiry** button.
② Select the account, input the **Partial Withdrawal Amount** and **Apply Interest Rate**, then press **Check Interest Rate**.
③ Review the **Early Termination Interest Rate** comparison in the pop-up and click **Proceed** to continue.
④ Confirm the **Total Payment Amount**, provide the required **Transaction Information** based on the withdrawal method, and click **Enter** to finalize the process.
Is NewYork Branch?
(KR) Account No. 선택 후 조회 버튼을 클릭 (EN) Select Account No. and press Inquiry button
(KR) 조회된 결과 그리드를 단건/복수 선택 후, 확인서 발송을 위한 UMS 버튼 클릭 (EN) Select an entry/entries of the results, and press UMS button to send Deposit Confirmation

The function of this screen is to **display a list of customer accounts as of a specific date**.

① Set the **Account Group** to **"Deposits Taken from Employees"** in the search criteria.
② Click the **Inquiry** button to retrieve the corresponding account list.
Is it a **Tokyo branch** and the deposit amount is over **2 million yen**?

Before the interest payment date, provide employees(the account holders) with a **withdrawal voucher** containing all relevant information except for the amount.

The employees should **affix their stamp** on the voucher.

The function of this screen is to **view interest amounts accrued for each account**. This screen allows users to efficiently access and verify finalized interest details on the designated payment date.

① On the **interest payment date**, enter the **Account Number** in the provided field.
② Click the **Inquiry** button to retrieve and confirm the **interest amount** for the specified account.

Is this related to registering or releasing an **accident account**?
Y: Register / N: Release

To **register** an account as an **accident account**, follow these steps:

① **Enter the Account Number** and click the **Search** button.
② From the **search results**, select the account to be registered as an accident account.
Is there a request from **another bank** to establish a **pledge** on the accident account?

In this case, enter the Accident Code, Judicial Restriction (Yes or No), Accident Registration Date, and

**Hold Balance Request** for the specified Counterparty,

then press the Enter button.
In this case, enter the Accident Code, Judicial Restriction (Yes or No), Accident Registration Date, then press the Enter button.

To release

1. After entering the Account Number, click the "Inquiry" button and **select the accident account** from the search results.
2. Review the details of the accident account to proceed with the **release** and then press "Enter."
Send a **notice to the account holder** about the registration or release of  accident account.

The function of this screen is to **modify account details**.

① **Enter** the Account Group Kind, Customer Number, or Account Number, then **click** the **Search** button.
② From the search results, **select** the account to be modified.
③ **Edit** the account ledger details and **press** the **Enter** button to save changes.

This screen enables users to efficiently locate and update account information, ensuring accurate and up-to-date records.

The function of this screen is to **modify the remarks of transactions**.

① **Enter** the **Account Group Kind**, **Customer Number**, or **Account Number**, and click the **Search** button.
② **Review** the search results and **select** the desired account or transaction to modify.
③ **Update** the remarks in the **Remarks** field and press **Enter** to save the changes.
